summary: Marc, a traveling entertainer, is on his way home for Christmas when his van brakes in the middle of a jerkwater town with some strange inhabitants.
cast: Laurent Lucas|Brigitte Lahaie|Gigi Coursigny|Jean-Luc Couchard|Jackie Berroyer|Philippe Nahon|Philippe Grand'Henry|Jo Prestia|Marc Lefebvre|Alfred David|Alain Delaunois|Vincent Cahay|Johan Meys|Romain Protat|Damien Waselle|Viktor Mikol|Nedzad Kurtagic|Yves Vaucher|Borhan Du Welz|Maxime Dewitte|Alexis Dewitte|Liam Gilson|Raphaël Schmidt|Eliot Cahay|Farkhad Alekperov
title: Calvario
